entry.title: As Interpol Picks New Leaders, Questions Grow Over How Autocratic Nations Use It
entry.content: The U.S. and other countries are trying to stop authoritarian states using fugitive alerts—the so-called red notices—to chase down dissidents.

entry.title: Massive Hack Gave Police a Window on Cocaine, Cash and Killers
entry.content: Special handsets have helped criminals flood Europe with cocaine, but when authorities got inside the networks, they gained an unobstructed view of the gangs at work—and the chance to thwart them.
